entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is a character in the story who has a conversation with Harry. She falls asleep and then wakes up, denying that she said anything about the Dark Lord rising again.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a character in the story who has a conversation with Professor Trelawney. He seems to be concerned about what Professor Trelawney said earlier.

entities.name: dark lord
entities.description: The Dark Lord is a concept mentioned in the story as someone or something that is not supposed to be named (He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named).

entities.name: he who must not be named
entities.description: He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named is a nickname for the Dark Lord.

relationships.description: Professor Trelawney and Harry have a conversation about what Professor Trelawney said earlier. She denies saying anything about the Dark Lord rising again.
Professor Trelawney seems to be predicting that the Dark Lord will rise again, but then denies saying anything about it.
